# Contributing to southern_light

Thank you for your interest in this project!

## Contribution Policy

**This project is not currently accepting code contributions.**

This repository serves as a shared utility library for:
- [github.com/arelate/theo](https://github.com/arelate/theo)
- [github.com/arelate/vangogh](https://github.com/arelate/vangogh)

The codebase is maintained internally to ensure consistency and compatibility with these dependent projects.

## Reporting Issues

While we're not accepting code contributions at this time, we welcome:

- **Bug reports**: If you encounter issues while using this library through theo or vangogh
- **Feature requests**: Suggestions for improvements

Please open an issue on GitHub with:
- A clear description of the problem or suggestion
- Steps to reproduce (for bugs)
- Relevant code snippets or error messages

## Questions and Support

For questions about using this library:
- Check the documentation in the dependent projects (theo or vangogh)
- Open a GitHub issue with the "question" label

## License

By submitting any content to this repository, you agree that your contributions will be licensed under the same license as the project (see LICENSE file).

---

Thank you for understanding our contribution policy. We appreciate your interest in the project!
